actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide for the modification of the project for Tuttle Creek Lake, Big Blue River, Kans., by authorizing the construction of a bridge.

summary.text: Authorizes the Corps of Engineers to provide for the modification of the project for Tuttle Creek Lake, Big Blue River, Kansas, by the construction of a replacement bridge to take the place of one severely damaged by floodwaters in the fall of 1973.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the modification of the project for Tuttle Creek Lake, Big Blue River, Kans., by authorizing the construction of a bridge.
